gaps.name: Non-Deterministic Lineage IDs
gaps.description: ProvenanceLedgerV2 generates random IDs (prov_${timestamp}_${random}) for new entries. This prevents deterministic replay of lineage events from logs or upstream jobs.
gaps.recommended_fix: Enforce deterministic IDs based on job/run/step context or payload hash.

gaps.name: Missing Graph Recovery Automation
gaps.description: No automated procedure exists to rebuild the Neo4j Canonical Graph from the Postgres Ledger. Recovery relies on tribal knowledge.
gaps.recommended_fix: Implement and test automated graph rebuilding script.

gaps.name: Undefined Lineage Durability Tiers
gaps.description: No formal definition of Hot/Warm/Cold tiers for lineage data, leading to ambiguity in RPO/RTO expectations.
gaps.recommended_fix: Document durability tiers and align with compliance requirements.
